title: The Zombies Are Attacking
itunes:title: The Zombies Are Attacking
description:
What is a zombie computer? What is a botnet? And what the heck is a DDoS attack? We look at a common tactic used by hackers to silence or inconvenience a target, how it works, and the measures companies like Cloudflare take to mitigate them.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
What is a zombie computer? What is a botnet? And what the heck is a DDoS attack? We look at a common tactic used by hackers to silence or inconvenience a target, how it works, and the measures companies like Cloudflare take to mitigate them.

itunes:keywords: zombie computer, zombie army, bot, botnet, Trojan, malware, hackers, client, server, Cloudflare, DDoS, DoS, denial of service, distributed denial of service
